excerpt: "Stemuli Founder and CEO Taylor Shead met two Los Angeles-area founders while participating in Jobs for the Future's Entrepreneur in Residence incubator. The three founders connected so strongly, they've now merged their companies with a shared goal of \"providing career navigation tools to empower students with the skills needed to thrive in the 21st century economy."
